text: Judith Anne Collins (born 24 February 1959) is a New Zealand politician. She was the Leader of the New Zealand National Party and Leader of the Opposition from 2020 until 2021. She has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Papakura since 2002. He was a government minister under John Key and Bill English. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Leaders of the Opposition (New Zealand) Category:Politicians from North Island Category:People from Hamilton, New Zealand
title: Judith Collins
